title: New: LUH – Beneath the Concrete
body:
Whereas the first couple of post-**WU LYF** offerings from Ellery Roberts could quite easily have passed as second album demos for the ill fated Mancunian outfit, he’s discovered a new direction through the Lost Under Heaven moniker, with partner in crime Ebony Hoorn.

Still drawing from the big-pop inspirations that littered Go Tell Fire, it’s a further call to arms, and one that’s gradually beginning to make sense. Spiritual Songs for Lovers to Sing is out 6th May on Mute.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
